{"data":[{"id":29,"title":"PlanetScale review: Horizontally scalable MySQL in the cloud","meta_k":"SQL mySQL","meta_d":"SQL mySQL","date":1689278400,"img":"cloud_computing_binary_rain_thinkstock_469846534_3x2-100740698-large.webp","description":"Vitess-powered PlanetScale scales to hold as much data as you need, but is currently limited to a single cluster.","text":"<p style=\"margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 16px; margin-left: 0px; font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" color:=\"\" rgb(78,=\"\" 66,=\"\" 66);=\"\" padding:=\"\" 0px;=\"\" font-size:=\"\" 1.125rem;=\"\" line-height:=\"\" 1.875rem;=\"\" max-width:=\"\" 620px;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\">PlanetScale is a MySQL-compatible, serverless database platform powered by Vitess, which is a database clustering system for horizontal scaling of MySQL (as well as Percona and MariaDB). Vitess also powers Slack, Square, GitHub, and YouTube, among others. The Slack deployment of Vitess has about 6,000 servers; the current largest Vitess deployment has about 70,000 servers.<\/p><p style=\"margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 16px; margin-left: 0px; font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" color:=\"\" rgb(78,=\"\" 66,=\"\" 66);=\"\" padding:=\"\" 0px;=\"\" font-size:=\"\" 1.125rem;=\"\" line-height:=\"\" 1.875rem;=\"\" max-width:=\"\" 620px;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\">MySQL databases are easy to use when you are just starting out, but when your database grows (for example, after a year or so of operations) you can easily run into its limits. The most commonly used MySQL database engine, InnoDB, has a maximum page size of 64 KB, which limits the row size. InnoDB also has a maximum tablespace size of 256 TB, which limits the size of a table.<\/p><p style=\"margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 16px; margin-left: 0px; font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" color:=\"\" rgb(78,=\"\" 66,=\"\" 66);=\"\" padding:=\"\" 0px;=\"\" font-size:=\"\" 1.125rem;=\"\" line-height:=\"\" 1.875rem;=\"\" max-width:=\"\" 620px;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\">Vitess helps you to scale a MySQL database by allowing you to shard it. A shard is a horizontal (row-wise) partition of the data. Once the database is sharded, Vitess takes care of routing queries to the appropriate MySQL instance based on the shard key field value, which lets you keep application changes to a minimum. Vitess also creates much lighter-weight connections than MySQL, allowing it to support thousands of connections, and it has configurable rules to rewrite queries that would hurt database performance.<\/p><div id=\"editorialfakesidebardiv\" class=\"fakesidebar fakesidebar-auto\" style=\"font-size: 1.0625rem; line-height: 1.625rem; margin: 0px 0px 1rem; overflow-x: auto; max-width: 620px; color: rgb(78, 66, 66); font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\"><aside id=\"fsb-4044\"><h4 style=\"color: rgb(34, 34, 34); margin: 1.625rem 0px 16px; max-width: 620px; padding: 0px; font-size: 1.225rem; line-height: 1.4375rem;\">[&nbsp;<u><a href=\"https:\/\/www.infoworld.com\/article\/3627792\/how-to-choose-a-cloud-database.html\" style=\"color: rgb(239, 76, 35); text-decoration: none;\">Also on InfoWorld: How to choose a cloud database<\/a><\/u>&nbsp;]<\/h4><\/aside><\/div><p style=\"margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 16px; margin-left: 0px; font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" color:=\"\" rgb(78,=\"\" 66,=\"\" 66);=\"\" padding:=\"\" 0px;=\"\" font-size:=\"\" 1.125rem;=\"\" line-height:=\"\" 1.875rem;=\"\" max-width:=\"\" 620px;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\">PlanetScale is basically Vitess on MySQL in the cloud, with a cloud user interface, plus a command line interface (CLI) that you can run on your own machine. The CLI can control almost everything in your PlanetScale instance, from creating databases down to manipulating data. Data manipulation depends on the Oracle MySQL client, which also needs to be installed on your machine.<\/p><p style=\"margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 16px; margin-left: 0px; font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" color:=\"\" rgb(78,=\"\" 66,=\"\" 66);=\"\" padding:=\"\" 0px;=\"\" font-size:=\"\" 1.125rem;=\"\" line-height:=\"\" 1.875rem;=\"\" max-width:=\"\" 620px;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\">As many as 10 distributed database products compete with PlanetScale, depending on whether you count NoSQL databases. Cloud-specific examples include&nbsp;<a href=\"https:\/\/www.infoworld.com\/article\/3209719\/review-google-cloud-spanner-takes-sql-to-nosql-scale.html\" style=\"font-family: sans-serif; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(239, 76, 35); text-decoration: none;\">Google Cloud Spanner<\/a>&nbsp;(relational),&nbsp;<a href=\"https:\/\/www.infoworld.com\/article\/3261548\/cosmos-db-review-database-for-a-small-planet.html\" style=\"font-family: sans-serif; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(239, 76, 35); text-decoration: none;\">Azure Cosmos DB<\/a>&nbsp;(multi-model NoSQL), Amazon DynamoDB (key-value and document), and&nbsp;<a href=\"https:\/\/www.infoworld.com\/article\/2989831\/review-amazon-aurora-rocks-mysql.html\" style=\"font-family: sans-serif; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(239, 76, 35); text-decoration: none;\">Amazon Aurora<\/a>&nbsp;(relational). Vendor examples include&nbsp;<a href=\"https:\/\/www.infoworld.com\/article\/3246628\/cockroachdb-review-a-scale-out-sql-database-built-for-survival.html\" style=\"font-family: sans-serif; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(239, 76, 35); text-decoration: none;\">CockroachDB<\/a>&nbsp;(relational),&nbsp;<a href=\"https:\/\/www.infoworld.com\/article\/3489459\/faunadb-review-fast-nosql-database-for-global-scale.html\" style=\"font-family: sans-serif; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(239, 76, 35); text-decoration: none;\">Fauna<\/a>&nbsp;(relational\/serverless),&nbsp;<a href=\"https:\/\/www.infoworld.com\/article\/3256064\/review-neo4j-graph-database-supercharges-graph-analytics.html\" style=\"font-family: sans-serif; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(239, 76, 35); text-decoration: none;\">Neo4j<\/a>&nbsp;(graph),&nbsp;<a href=\"https:\/\/www.infoworld.com\/article\/3300619\/review-mongodb-takes-on-the-world.html\" style=\"font-family: sans-serif; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(239, 76, 35); text-decoration: none;\">MongoDB Atlas<\/a>&nbsp;(document),&nbsp;<a href=\"https:\/\/www.infoworld.com\/article\/3298539\/datastax-review-cassandra-made-faster-and-easier.html\" style=\"font-family: sans-serif; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(239, 76, 35); text-decoration: none;\">DataStax Astra<\/a>&nbsp;(wide-column), and&nbsp;<a href=\"https:\/\/www.infoworld.com\/article\/3430716\/couchbase-review-a-smart-nosql-database.html\" style=\"font-family: sans-serif; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(239, 76, 35); text-decoration: none;\">Couchbase Cloud<\/a>&nbsp;(document). Follow those links to my reviews of these products.<\/p><h2 style=\"color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" padding:=\"\" 0px;=\"\" margin:=\"\" 1.625rem=\"\" 0px=\"\" 16px;=\"\" max-width:=\"\" 620px;=\"\" font-size:=\"\" 1.8rem;=\"\" line-height:=\"\" 1.2em;=\"\" text-align:=\"\" start;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\">PlanetScale setup<\/h2><p style=\"margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 16px; margin-left: 0px; font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" color:=\"\" rgb(78,=\"\" 66,=\"\" 66);=\"\" padding:=\"\" 0px;=\"\" font-size:=\"\" 1.125rem;=\"\" line-height:=\"\" 1.875rem;=\"\" max-width:=\"\" 620px;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\">Getting started with PlanetScale is about as easy as it could be. The default is the free developer plan, which doesn\u2019t require a credit card \u2014 just a name, email address, password, and eventually an organization name. If and when you exceed the limits of the developer plan, you can add a credit card and switch to the scaler plan.<\/p><aside class=\"nativo-promo nativo-promo-1 smartphone\" id=\"\" style=\"overflow: hidden; margin: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 620px; color: rgb(78, 66, 66); font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\"><\/aside><p style=\"margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 16px; margin-left: 0px; font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" color:=\"\" rgb(78,=\"\" 66,=\"\" 66);=\"\" padding:=\"\" 0px;=\"\" font-size:=\"\" 1.125rem;=\"\" line-height:=\"\" 1.875rem;=\"\" max-width:=\"\" 620px;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\">You also need to install the PlanetScale CLI on your development machine, as well as the MySQL client shell. On a Mac, you install both with Homebrew. On Linux, you download the appropriate binary and use&nbsp;<code style=\"color: rgb(124, 24, 6); font-family: monospace, serif; font-size: 1em;\">dpkg<\/code>&nbsp;(Debian) or&nbsp;<code style=\"color: rgb(124, 24, 6); font-family: monospace, serif; font-size: 1em;\">rpm<\/code>&nbsp;(Red Hat). On Windows, download and run the installers.<\/p><div id=\"sponsoredfakesidebardiv\" class=\"fakesidebar fakesidebar-auto fakesidebar-sponsored\" style=\"font-size: 1.0625rem; line-height: 1.625rem; margin: 0px 0px 1rem; overflow-x: auto; max-width: 620px; color: rgb(78, 66, 66); font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\"><aside id=\"fsb-4244\"><a href=\"https:\/\/survey.researchresults.com\/survey\/selfserve\/53b\/s00643290501?ctry=1&amp;ver=8\" style=\"color: rgb(239, 76, 35); text-decoration: none;\">Nominations are open for the 2024 Best Places to Work in IT<\/a><\/aside><\/div><figure class=\"large \" style=\"margin-bottom: 16px; max-width: 620px; width: auto; float: none; clear: none; overflow: hidden; padding: 0px; color: rgb(78, 66, 66); font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\"><a class=\"zoom article-gallery cboxElement\" href=\"https:\/\/images.idgesg.net\/images\/article\/2021\/08\/planetscale-01-100900617-orig.jpg?auto=webp&amp;quality=85,70\" rel=\"nofollow\" title=\"<div class='credit'>IDG<\/div>\r\n<p>To get started with PlanetScale, create a log-in and an organization name.<\/p>\r\n\" style=\"color: rgb(34, 34, 34); text-decoration: none; position: relative; display: block; overflow: hidden; max-width: 620px;\"><img border=\"0\" alt=\"planetscale 01\" width=\"1200\" height=\"698\" data-imageid=\"100900617\" data-license=\"IDG\" data-original=\"https:\/\/images.idgesg.net\/images\/article\/2021\/08\/planetscale-01-100900617-large.jpg?auto=webp&amp;quality=85,70\" class=\"lazy\" loading=\"lazy\" src=\"https:\/\/images.idgesg.net\/images\/article\/2021\/08\/planetscale-01-100900617-large.jpg?auto=webp&amp;quality=85,70\" style=\"border: 0px; max-width: 39rem; height: auto; float: left; width: 620px; margin-top: 0px;\"><\/a><div><br><\/div><\/figure>","author_id":10049,"category_id":4,"type":"post","publish_status":1,"comment_count":0,"view":9,"author_posts_count":7,"author_name":"Admin","user_id":10049,"category_name":"mySQL","posts_count":2},{"id":28,"title":"MariaDB SkySQL adds serverless analytics, cost management features","meta_k":"SQL mySQL","meta_d":"SQL mySQL","date":1689278400,"img":"shutterstock_359257322-100936181-large.webp","description":"The new release of the managed database as a service removes the need for extracting, transforming, and loading data by adding a \u2018serverless\u2019 layer powered by Apache Spark SQL","text":"<p style=\"margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 16px; margin-left: 0px; font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" color:=\"\" rgb(78,=\"\" 66,=\"\" 66);=\"\" padding:=\"\" 0px;=\"\" font-size:=\"\" 1.125rem;=\"\" line-height:=\"\" 1.875rem;=\"\" max-width:=\"\" 620px;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\">MariaDB is adding features such as serverless analytics and cost management to the new release of its managed database-as-a-service (DBaaS) SkySQL, it said Thursday.<\/p><p style=\"margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 16px; margin-left: 0px; font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" color:=\"\" rgb(78,=\"\" 66,=\"\" 66);=\"\" padding:=\"\" 0px;=\"\" font-size:=\"\" 1.125rem;=\"\" line-height:=\"\" 1.875rem;=\"\" max-width:=\"\" 620px;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\">SkySQL, which is a&nbsp;<a href=\"https:\/\/www.infoworld.com\/article\/3534698\/skysql-mariadb-as-a-service-launches-on-google-cloud.html\" style=\"color: rgb(239, 76, 35); text-decoration: none;\">managed instance of the MariaDB platform<\/a>, offers&nbsp;<a href=\"https:\/\/www.infoworld.com\/article\/3649211\/what-is-olap-analytical-databases.html\" style=\"color: rgb(239, 76, 35); text-decoration: none;\">OLAP<\/a>&nbsp;(online analytical processing) and&nbsp;<a href=\"https:\/\/www.infoworld.com\/article\/3650769\/what-is-oltp-the-backbone-of-ecommerce.html\" style=\"color: rgb(239, 76, 35); text-decoration: none;\">OLTP<\/a>&nbsp;(online transaction processing) along with enterprise features like sharding, load balancing, and auto-failover via a combination of&nbsp;<a href=\"https:\/\/www.infoworld.com\/article\/3574077\/how-mariadb-achieves-global-scale-with-xpand.html\" style=\"color: rgb(239, 76, 35); text-decoration: none;\">MariaDB Xpand<\/a>,&nbsp;<a href=\"https:\/\/mariadb.com\/docs\/server\/products\/mariadb-enterprise-server\/\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: rgb(239, 76, 35); text-decoration: none;\">MariaDB Enterprise Server<\/a>, and&nbsp;<a href=\"https:\/\/mariadb.com\/kb\/en\/mariadb-columnstore\/\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: rgb(239, 76, 35); text-decoration: none;\">MariaDB ColumnStore<\/a>.<\/p><p style=\"margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 16px; margin-left: 0px; font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" color:=\"\" rgb(78,=\"\" 66,=\"\" 66);=\"\" padding:=\"\" 0px;=\"\" font-size:=\"\" 1.125rem;=\"\" line-height:=\"\" 1.875rem;=\"\" max-width:=\"\" 620px;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\">In order to help enterprises bring down the cost of databases and to manage expenditure better, MariaDB has introduced an autoscaling feature for both compute and storage.<\/p><div id=\"editorialfakesidebardiv\" class=\"fakesidebar fakesidebar-auto\" style=\"font-size: 1.0625rem; line-height: 1.625rem; margin: 0px 0px 1rem; overflow-x: auto; max-width: 620px; color: rgb(78, 66, 66); font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\"><aside id=\"fsb-4044\"><h4 style=\"color: rgb(34, 34, 34); margin: 1.625rem 0px 16px; max-width: 620px; padding: 0px; font-size: 1.225rem; line-height: 1.4375rem;\">[&nbsp;<u><a href=\"https:\/\/www.infoworld.com\/article\/3627792\/how-to-choose-a-cloud-database.html\" style=\"color: rgb(239, 76, 35); text-decoration: none;\">Also on InfoWorld: How to choose a cloud database<\/a><\/u>&nbsp;]<\/h4><\/aside><\/div><p style=\"margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 16px; margin-left: 0px; font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" color:=\"\" rgb(78,=\"\" 66,=\"\" 66);=\"\" padding:=\"\" 0px;=\"\" font-size:=\"\" 1.125rem;=\"\" line-height:=\"\" 1.875rem;=\"\" max-width:=\"\" 620px;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\">\u201cRules specify when autoscaling is triggered, for example, when CPU utilization is above 75% over all replicas sustained for 30 minutes, then a new replica or node will be added to handle the increase,\u201d the company said in a statement.<\/p><div class=\"brVideoContainer\" style=\"bottom: 5px; right: 5px; width: 401px; height: 225px; position: fixed; border: none; overflow: hidden; z-index: 1400000; color: rgb(78, 66, 66); font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\"><div class=\"outer-wrapper\" style=\"margin: 0px auto; max-width: 600px; top: 0px; left: 0px; width: 401px; height: 225px; border: none; overflow: hidden; position: relative;\"><div id=\"bottomRightPlayer\" class=\"jwplayer jw-reset jw-state-idle jw-stretch-uniform jw-flag-aspect-mode jw-breakpoint-1 jw-flag-small-player jw-flag-user-inactive\" tabindex=\"0\" aria-label=\"Video Player\" role=\"application\" aria-describedby=\"jw-bottomRightPlayer-shortcuts-tooltip-explanation\" data-gtm-vis-recent-on-screen-11064220_192=\"15885\" data-gtm-vis-first-on-screen-11064220_192=\"15885\" data-gtm-vis-total-visible-time-11064220_192=\"100\" data-gtm-vis-has-fired-11064220_192=\"1\" style=\"direction: ltr; color: inherit; background-color: transparent; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; float: none; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; line-height: 1em; list-style: none; vertical-align: baseline; border: 0px; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0); width: 401px; position: relative; min-height: 0px; overflow: hidden; user-select: none; outline: 0px; height: auto !important;\"><div class=\"jw-wrapper jw-reset\" style=\"direction: ltr; color: inherit; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0px; margin: 0px; float: none; font-size: 1em; line-height: 1em; list-style: none; vertical-align: baseline; border: 0px; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0); box-sizing: inherit; position: absolute; inset: 0px;\"><div class=\"jw-media jw-reset\" style=\"direction: ltr; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0); position: absolute; top: 0px; box-sizing: inherit; pointer-events: none; width: 401px; z-index: 1;\"><div class=\"jw-title-primary jw-reset-text\" style=\"color: rgb(255, 255, 255); background-color: transparent; padding: 0px 20px 0.5em; margin: 0px; float: none; font-size: 1.25em; line-height: 1em; list-style: none; vertical-align: baseline; border: 0px; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0); box-sizing: inherit; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; direction: unset; text-wrap: nowrap; width: 347px;\">How to manage logins and users for a Django website using Python<\/div><\/div><div class=\"jw-overlays jw-reset\" style=\"direction: ltr; color: inherit; background-color: transparent; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; float: none; font-size: 1em; line-height: 1em; list-style: none; vertical-align: baseline; border: 0px; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0); box-sizing: inherit; position: absolute; bottom: 66px; pointer-events: all;\"><\/div><div id=\"bottomRightPlayer_bidding\" class=\"jw-plugin jw-reset\" style=\"direction: ltr; color: inherit; background-color: transparent; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; float: none; font-size: 1em; line-height: 1em; list-style: none; vertical-align: baseline; border: 0px; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0); box-sizing: inherit; position: absolute; bottom: 66px; pointer-events: all;\"><\/div><\/div><div class=\"jw-hidden-accessibility\" style=\"box-sizing: inherit; border: 0px; clip: rect(0px, 0px, 0px, 0px); height: 1px; margin: -1px; overflow: hidden; padding: 0px; position: absolute; width: 1px;\"><span class=\"jw-time-update\" aria-live=\"assertive\" style=\"box-sizing: inherit;\">0 seconds of 8 minutes, 22 seconds<\/span><span class=\"jw-volume-update\" aria-live=\"assertive\" style=\"box-sizing: inherit;\">Volume 0%<\/span><\/div><div class=\"jw-logo jw-logo-top-right jw-hide jw-reset\" style=\"direction: ltr; color: inherit; background-color: transparent; padding: 0px; margin: 10px 10px 20px 20px; float: none; font-size: 1em; line-height: 1em; list-style: none; vertical-align: baseline; border: 0px; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0); box-sizing: inherit; pointer-events: all; position: absolute; cursor: pointer; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-size: contain; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; float: none; font-size: 1em; line-height: 1em; list-style: none; vertical-align: baseline; border: 0px; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0); box-sizing: inherit; flex: 1 1 auto; overflow: hidden; display: flex; flex-flow: column wrap; justify-content: center; align-items: center;\"><div class=\"jw-nextup-header jw-reset\" style=\"direction: ltr; font-stretch: inherit; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0); box-sizing: inherit; font-weight: 700;\"><\/div><\/div><\/div><\/div><\/div><\/div><\/div><div class=\"afs_ads ad-placement\" style=\"box-sizing: inherit; width: 1px; height: 1px; position: absolute; background: transparent;\">&nbsp;<\/div><\/div><\/div><\/div><p style=\"margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 16px; margin-left: 0px; font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" color:=\"\" rgb(78,=\"\" 66,=\"\" 66);=\"\" padding:=\"\" 0px;=\"\" font-size:=\"\" 1.125rem;=\"\" line-height:=\"\" 1.875rem;=\"\" max-width:=\"\" 620px;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\">\u201cSimilarly, when CPU utilization is less than 50% over all replicas for an hour, nodes or a replica is removed. Users always specify the top and bottom threshold so there are never any cost surprises,\u201d it explained, adding that enterprises only pay for the resources used.<\/p><p style=\"margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 16px; margin-left: 0px; font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" color:=\"\" rgb(78,=\"\" 66,=\"\" 66);=\"\" padding:=\"\" 0px;=\"\" font-size:=\"\" 1.125rem;=\"\" line-height:=\"\" 1.875rem;=\"\" max-width:=\"\" 620px;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\">In addition to autoscaling, the company has added serverless analytics capabilities eliminating the need for running&nbsp;<a href=\"https:\/\/www.infoworld.com\/article\/3231652\/etl-is-dead.html\" style=\"color: rgb(239, 76, 35); text-decoration: none;\">extract, transform, load (ETL)<\/a>&nbsp;tasks.<\/p><aside class=\"nativo-promo nativo-promo-1 smartphone\" id=\"\" style=\"overflow: hidden; margin: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 620px; color: rgb(78, 66, 66); font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\"><\/aside><p style=\"margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 16px; margin-left: 0px; font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" color:=\"\" rgb(78,=\"\" 66,=\"\" 66);=\"\" padding:=\"\" 0px;=\"\" font-size:=\"\" 1.125rem;=\"\" line-height:=\"\" 1.875rem;=\"\" max-width:=\"\" 620px;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\">\u201cSkySQL enables operational analytics on active transactional data as well as external data sources using a serverless analytics layer powered by Apache Spark SQL,\u201d the company said, adding that this approach removes inconsistencies between an analytical view and a transactional view.<\/p><div id=\"sponsoredfakesidebardiv\" class=\"fakesidebar fakesidebar-auto fakesidebar-sponsored\" style=\"font-size: 1.0625rem; line-height: 1.625rem; margin: 0px 0px 1rem; overflow-x: auto; max-width: 620px; color: rgb(78, 66, 66); font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\"><aside id=\"fsb-4244\"><a href=\"https:\/\/survey.researchresults.com\/survey\/selfserve\/53b\/s00643290501?ctry=1&amp;ver=8\" style=\"color: rgb(239, 76, 35); text-decoration: none;\">Nominations are open for the 2024 Best Places to Work in IT<\/a><\/aside><\/div><p style=\"margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 16px; margin-left: 0px; font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" color:=\"\" rgb(78,=\"\" 66,=\"\" 66);=\"\" padding:=\"\" 0px;=\"\" font-size:=\"\" 1.125rem;=\"\" line-height:=\"\" 1.875rem;=\"\" max-width:=\"\" 620px;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\">Further, it said that enterprises will pay for the compute used for analytics without the need to provision for processing power.<\/p><aside class=\"nativo-promo nativo-promo-1 tablet desktop\" id=\"\" style=\"overflow: hidden; margin: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 620px; color: rgb(78, 66, 66); font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\"><\/aside><p style=\"margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 16px; margin-left: 0px; font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" color:=\"\" rgb(78,=\"\" 66,=\"\" 66);=\"\" padding:=\"\" 0px;=\"\" font-size:=\"\" 1.125rem;=\"\" line-height:=\"\" 1.875rem;=\"\" max-width:=\"\" 620px;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\">Additional features in the new release includes access for data scientists to a specific version of&nbsp;<a href=\"https:\/\/www.infoworld.com\/article\/3226734\/how-to-set-up-zeppelin-for-analytics-and-visualization.amp.html\" style=\"color: rgb(239, 76, 35); text-decoration: none;\">Apache Zeppelin notebooks<\/a>.<\/p><p style=\"margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 16px; margin-left: 0px; font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" color:=\"\" rgb(78,=\"\" 66,=\"\" 66);=\"\" padding:=\"\" 0px;=\"\" font-size:=\"\" 1.125rem;=\"\" line-height:=\"\" 1.875rem;=\"\" max-width:=\"\" 620px;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\">\u201cThe notebook is pre-loaded with examples that demonstrate ways to run analytics on data stored in SkySQL. It can also be used to discover database schemas, running queries on data stored in Amazon S3 and federating queries to join data across SkySQL databases and S3 object storage,\u201d the company said.<\/p><p style=\"margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 16px; margin-left: 0px; font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" color:=\"\" rgb(78,=\"\" 66,=\"\" 66);=\"\" padding:=\"\" 0px;=\"\" font-size:=\"\" 1.125rem;=\"\" line-height:=\"\" 1.875rem;=\"\" max-width:=\"\" 620px;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\">The new release of SkySQL has been made generally available on AWS and Google cloud. It includes updated MariaDB Xpand 6.1.1, Enterprise Server 10.6.12 and ColumnStore 6.3.1.<\/p><p style=\"margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 16px; margin-left: 0px; font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" color:=\"\" rgb(78,=\"\" 66,=\"\" 66);=\"\" padding:=\"\" 0px;=\"\" font-size:=\"\" 1.125rem;=\"\" line-height:=\"\" 1.875rem;=\"\" max-width:=\"\" 620px;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\">New customers signing up for the DBaaS can claim $500 in credits, MariaDB said.<\/p>","author_id":10049,"category_id":4,"type":"post","publish_status":1,"comment_count":0,"view":18,"author_posts_count":7,"author_name":"Admin","user_id":10049,"category_name":"mySQL","posts_count":2}],"end_time":1710520025}
